title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Dec 23 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Dec 23 2021
description:
Missouri's Attorney General Eric Schmitt joins Clay to discuss fighting mask mandates in schools and the ongoing legal battle on the OSHA vaccine mandate. Biden confuses pills and test kits. If you feel sick, stay home. Film fan Clay lists his favorite Christmas movies and asks the question: What is your favorite Christmas movie? Movie buffs flood the phone lines. Online response: 32,000 votes!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
